alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 1:44AM MST until January 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow will taper off this morning, becoming scattered snow showers after daybreak. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Dilkon, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Kykotsmovi, Payson, Pine-Strawberry and Shonto. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 1 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Dilkon 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Kykotsmovi 0 to 1 inches Payson 0 to 1 inches Pine-Strawberry 0 to 1 inches Shonto 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Northern Gila County
